companyInfo.Competitors: Fiserv, First Data, Jack Henry & Associates

jobDescription: Position Responsibilities\Requirements:Data Warehousing/Data Architect:Job Description: The person in this position will play a key role in designing and developing of data models, interfaces /other applications in Oracle PL/SQL for clients of FIS ACBS.  Collaborate with clients and understand the requirements provided and thus relating it to ACBS product. Perform business transformation/data governance workshops with clients to architect information and reporting strategy. Perform data modeling and data design. This includes logical and physical modeling, partitioning strategies for large tables, and other database optimizations. Responsible for creating high and low level architectural and data designs and development for different enhancements and other applications on the basis of requirement specifications. Also, requirement refinement, if needed. Responsible for providing Preliminary and Detailed estimates for different artifacts Performing testing, documenting user test cases, and creating test logs. Maintain and Support existing applications developed for client. Also providing third line support to the production client's Datamart environment by troubleshooting the issues reported and providing prompt resolution. Assist ACBS ASP (application service provider) support team as and when required related to Datamart Interfaces/client applications. Knowledge, Skills, and abilities required:
